replayRulesOnExistingDB() replayRulesOnExistingDBRuleCollection RuleCollectionreplayRulesOnExistingDB
replayRulesOnExistingDB ( $offset = 0 , $maxtime = 0 , $items = [] , $params = [] )
Replay Collection on DB
Paramètres
integer$offset
first row to work on (default 0)
float$maxtime
max system time to stop working (default 0)
array$items
array containing items to replay. If empty -> all
array$params
array additional parameters if needed
Renvoie
int|false -1 if all rows done, else offset for next run, or false on error
